articles.title: Delhi University to conduct practical exams, viva voce for undergraduates offline
articles.description: This year, Delhi University has decided to organize practical examinations and viva voce this year. DU has also carried out strict instructions to all the colleges in its fold to follow Covid guidelines properly. While the internal exams of DU will have 25% w…
articles.content: DUs Examination Branch released a notification which made it clear that internal assessments, projects, practicals, oral examinations, viva voce, fieldwork, internships and apprenticeships will be co… [+951 chars]

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Lalbagh Express completes 30 years of journey
articles.description: Lalbagh express, which runs between Bengaluru and Chennai, completed 30 years of service on Friday.

articles.title: अब देवघर से 1 घंटे 10 मिनट में पहुंचे कोलकाता, जानिए- कितना है किराया और कितने बजे की होगी फ्लाइट
articles.description: Deoghar Airport: उद्घाटन से पहले तमाम फ्लाइट बुकिंग साइट्स पर देवघर एयरपोर्ट रजिस्टर हो चुका है। इनमें देवघर का कोड DGH रखा गया है। देवघर एय़रपोर्ट से 12 जुलाई की शाम पहली बार इंडिगो का यात्री विमान कोलकाता के लिए उड़ान भरेगा।
